${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:PistolShot.NAME: Pistol Shot
${modID}:PistolShot.DESCRIPTION: Ranged NL Deal !D! damage to an enemy and the one behind it.

${modID}:InstantSleepDart.NAME: Instant Sleep Dart
${modID}:InstantSleepDart.DESCRIPTION: Ranged NL Deal !D! damage to an enemy and immediately Sleep them for one turn.

${modID}:SleepDart.NAME: Sleep Dart
${modID}:SleepDart.DESCRIPTION: Ranged NL Deal !D! damage to an enemy, next turn, Sleep them for one turn.

${modID}:ScopedInCrossbow.NAME: Scoped-in crossbow
${modID}:ScopedInCrossbow.DESCRIPTION: Ranged NL Deal !D! damage to an enemy.

${modID}:Grenade.NAME: Grenade
${modID}:Grenade.DESCRIPTION: Ranged NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:IncendiaryBolt.NAME: Incendiary bolt
${modID}:IncendiaryBolt.DESCRIPTION: Ranged NL Deal !D! damage to an enemy and apply !M! stacks of Burn to it.

${modID}:CombustionBolt.NAME: Combustion bolt
${modID}:CombustionBolt.DESCRIPTION: Ranged NL Deal !D! damage to an enemy and apply !M! stacks of Burn to ALL enemies.

${modID}:HardenedBolt.NAME: Hardened bolt
${modID}:HardenedBolt.DESCRIPTION: Ranged NL Deal !D! damage to an enemy.

${modID}:PiercingStab.NAME: Piercing stab
${modID}:PiercingStab.DESCRIPTION: Melee NL Deal !D! damage to an enemy and !M! % to the enemy to its right.

${modID}:ChokeOut.NAME: Choke out
${modID}:ChokeOut.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, deal !D! damage and Sleep the targeted enemy.

${modID}:SummonRatAttack.NAME: Summon rat attack
${modID}:SummonRatAttack.DESCRIPTION: Gore NL Exhaust NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies 5 times. The fear effect can be applied at most once.

${modID}:SummonWeeperAttack.NAME: Summon weeper attack
${modID}:SummonWeeperAttack.DESCRIPTION: Fear NL Exhaust NL Deal !D! damage to an enemy.

${modID}:SummonBloodflyAttack.NAME: Summon bloodfly attack
${modID}:SummonBloodflyAttack.DESCRIPTION: Fear NL Exhaust NL Deal !D! damage !M! times to ALL enemies, each hit applies the Fear.

${modID}:Punch.NAME: Punch
${modID}:Punch.DESCRIPTION: Melee NL Deal !D! damage to an enemy.

${modID}:ThroatSlit.NAME: Throat slit
${modID}:ThroatSlit.DESCRIPTION: Melee NL If in Stealth, deal !D! damage to an enemy. NL If in Combat, deal 50% of that damage and Fear. NL If in Neutral stance, deal 50% of the damage and roll the chance for a Fear.

${modID}:DropAssassination.NAME: Drop assassination
${modID}:DropAssassination.DESCRIPTION: Melee NL Can only be played in Stealth, deal !D! damage to an enemy and enter Combat.

${modID}:BloodDisplay.NAME: Blood display
${modID}:BloodDisplay.DESCRIPTION: Melee NL Deal !D! damage, if in Combat and it is lethal, Fear ALL enemies, otherwise, roll for Fear.

${modID}:Terrify.NAME: Terrify
${modID}:Terrify.DESCRIPTION: Melee NL Deal !D! damage. If lethal, Fear ALL enemies.

${modID}:StingingBolt.NAME: Stinging bolt
${modID}:StingingBolt.DESCRIPTION: Ranged NL Deal !D! damage to an enemy and Fear ALL enemies.

${modID}:HowlingBolt.NAME: Howling bolt
${modID}:HowlingBolt.DESCRIPTION: Ranged NL Deal !D! damage to an enemy and apply !M! Weak to it.

${modID}:SprayNPray.NAME: Spray And Pray
${modID}:SprayNPray.DESCRIPTION: Ranged NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

${modID}:ExplosiveBullet.NAME: Explosive bullet
${modID}:ExplosiveBullet.DESCRIPTION: Ranged NL Deal !D! damage to an enemy and 50% of it to that enemy again and the one on the right.

${modID}:ClusterBullet.NAME: Cluster bullet
${modID}:ClusterBullet.DESCRIPTION: Ranged NL Deal !D! damage to an enemy and 50% of it to ALL enemies.

${modID}:CoffinNails.NAME: Coffin nails
${modID}:CoffinNails.DESCRIPTION: Ranged NL Deal !D! damage to an enemy twice and apply !M! Vulnerable to it.

${modID}:SummonAssassin.NAME: Summon assassin
${modID}:SummonAssassin.DESCRIPTION: Ranged NL Deal !D! to an enemy and Fear ALL enemies, counts as being in Stealth. Once played, go back to Neutral stance.

${modID}:TwistTheKnife.NAME: Twist the knife
${modID}:TwistTheKnife.DESCRIPTION: Melee NL Deal !D! damage to an enemy, if that enemy is Weak and Vulnerable, gain 2 Energy and draw 1 card.

${modID}:FoldingBlade.NAME: Folding blade
${modID}:FoldingBlade.DESCRIPTION: Melee NL If in Combat, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies, otherwise, twice that damage to an enemy.

${modID}:ShadowAssassination.NAME: Shadow assassination
${modID}:ShadowAssassination.DESCRIPTION: Melee NL Deal !D! damage to an enemy, then, enter Stealth.

${modID}:ThievingStrike.NAME: Thieving strike
${modID}:ThievingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Melee NL Deal !D! damage to an enemy and draw !M! card.

${modID}:PommelToTheNeck.NAME: Pommel to the neck
${modID}:PommelToTheNeck.DESCRIPTION: Melee NL Deal !D! damage to an enemy and sleep them if in Stealth.

${modID}:SewerStrike.NAME: Sewer strike
${modID}:SewerStrike.DESCRIPTION: Melee NL If in Stealth, apply !M! Vulnerable to an enemy. NL Deal !D! damage to an enemy.

${modID}:Blink.NAME: Blink
${modID}:Blink.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block, the next attack deals 10 more damage.

${modID}:DevouringSwarm.NAME: Devouring swarm
${modID}:DevouringSwarm.DESCRIPTION: Gore NL Deal !D! damage !M! times to an enemy. The Fear is rolled three times but can only be applied once.

${modID}:Springrazor.NAME: Springrazor
${modID}:Springrazor.DESCRIPTION: Gore NL Next turn, deal !D! damage !M! times to ALL enemies, Fear can be applied at most twice.

${modID}:Clairvoyance.NAME: Clairvoyance
${modID}:Clairvoyance.DESCRIPTION: Retain NL Reveal the target's intent on its next turn. NL Exhaust

${modID}:ArcMine.NAME: Arc mine
${modID}:ArcMine.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak to an enemy.

${modID}:ChainingArcMine.NAME: Chaining arc mine
${modID}:ChainingArcMine.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

${modID}:ChargedUpArcMine.NAME: Charged up arc mine
${modID}:ChargedUpArcMine.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, deal !D! damage !M! times and apply !M! Vulnerable on each hit to one enemy.

${modID}:StunMine.NAME: Stun mine
${modID}:StunMine.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, apply !M! Vulnerable and !M! Weak to an enemy.

${modID}:QuickStunMine.NAME: Quick stun mine
${modID}:QuickStunMine.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !M! Weak to an enemy.

${modID}:Windblast.NAME: Wind blast
${modID}:Windblast.DESCRIPTION: Gore NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies and apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

${modID}:Domino.NAME: Domino
${modID}:Domino.DESCRIPTION: Mark ALL enemies. Whenever you attack a marked enemy, deal !M! % of the damage dealt to all marked enemies.
